effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an Alola sandshrew into Alola sandslash or an Alola vulpix into Alola ninetales.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves an Alola Sandshrew into Alola Sandslash or an Alola Vulpix into Alola Ninetales.

flavor_text_entries.text: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has an unmistakable snowflake pattern.
